name: Jirachi
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you put Jirachi from your hand onto your Bench, you may flip 3 coins. For each heads, search your discard pile for a Psychic Energy card and attach it to Jirachi.
Attack1Text: Choose a number of your opponent's Stage 1 or Stage 2 Evolved Pokemon up to the amount of Energy attached to Jirachi. Remove the highest Stage Evolution card from each of those Pokemon and put those cards back into your opponent's hand.

name: Magmortar
Attack1Text: Discard the top 3 cards from your deck. This attack does 50 damage times the number of Energy cards you discarded.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Fire Energy attached to Magmortar.

name: Manaphy
Attack1Text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 5 cards.

name: Metagross
AbilityText: If you have any Psychic Energy attached to your Active Pokemon, the Retreat Cost for that Pokemon is 0.
Attack2Text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 40 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Mismagius
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Psychic Energy attached to 1 of your Pokemon to another of your Pokemon. This power can't be used if Mismagius is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon that has any damage counters on it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Octillery
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Switch Octillery with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

name: Politoed
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may choose a Water Pokemon on your Bench and switch it with your Active Pokemon. This power can't be used if Politoed is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin for each Water Pokemon you have in play. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Shaymin
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you put Shaymin from your hand onto your Bench, you may move as many Energy cards attached to your Pokemon as you like to any of your other Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Remove 3 damage counters from each of your Pokemon that has any Energy attached to it.

name: Sudowoodo
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage times the amount of Fighting Energy attached to Sudowoodo.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Torterra
Attack1Text: Remove from Torterra the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Xatu
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Beedrill
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is also Paralyzed.

name: Blastoise
AbilityText: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Water Energy attached to 1 of your Benched Pokemon to your Active Pokemon. This power can't be used if Blastoise is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Return 2 Water Energy attached to Blastoise to your hand. Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 100 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Crobat
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Fearow
Attack2Text: Flip 5 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Floatzel
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Water Energy card from your hand to Floatzel. This power can't be used if Floatzel is affected by a Special Condition.

name: Kingdra
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: You may do 50 damage plus 30 more damage. If you do, return an Energy card attached to Kingdra to your hand.

name: Lanturn
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Move an Energy card attached to Lanturn to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Lucario
Attack1Text: During your next turn, each of Lucario's attacks does 30 more damage to the Defending Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Ninetales
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for up to 3 Fire Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Poliwrath
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 damage plus 40 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Primeape
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Roserade
AbilityText: When you attach a Grass Energy card or Psychic Energy card from your hand to Roserade during your turn, you may use this power. If you attach a Grass Energy card, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused. If you attach a Psychic Energy card, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. This power can't be used if Roserade is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to Roserade.

name: Steelix
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Steelix by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 80 damage times the number of heads.

name: Torkoal
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you put Torkoal from your hand onto your Bench, you may flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Tyranitar
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Ursaring
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Cherrim
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may remove 1 damage counter from your Active Pokemon. This power can't be used if Cherrim is affected by a Special Condition.

name: Dunsparce
Attack1Text: Draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

name: Golbat
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Grotle
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Kakuna
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from Kakuna and put it onto Kakuna. (This counts as evolving Kakuna.) Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Metang
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for up to 2 Psychic Energy cards and attach them to your Pokemon in any way you like.

name: Minun
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokemon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: If Plusle is on your Bench, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Numel
Attack1Text: Discard a Fire Energy card from your hand. Then, draw 3 cards.

name: Plusle
Attack1Text: Draw 2 cards.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Plusle does 10 damage to itself.

name: Poliwhirl
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Pupitar
AbilityText: If Pupitar has any Energy attached to it, the Retreat Cost of Pupitar is 0.
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Pupitar.

name: Seadra
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Tauros
Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads. Tauros is now Confused.

name: Wartortle
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Aipom
Attack1Text: Move an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon to another of your opponent's Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Beldum
Attack1Text: You may switch Beldum with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Buizel
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Carnivine
Attack1Text: Search your deck for an Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Horsea
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Larvitar
Attack1Text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck. Then, remove 2 damage counters from Larvitar.
Attack2Text: Larvitar does 10 damage to itself.

name: Mankey
Attack2Text: Does 40 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on Mankey.

name: Misdreavus
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Natu
Attack2Text: Switch Natu with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Onix
AbilityText: Whenever you attach an Energy card from your hand to Onix, remove a damage counter from Onix.
Attack1Text: Onix can't attack during your next turn.

name: Onix
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Poliwag
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Remoraid
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Riolu
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Roselia
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads. Roselia is now Confused.

name: Spearow
Attack1Text: Remove 4 damage counters from Spearow. Spearow can't retreat during your next turn.

name: Stantler
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokemon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Teddiursa
Attack1Text: Teddiursa does 10 damage to itself.

name: Tropius
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, search your deck for a Grass Pokemon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Turtwig
Attack1Text: If this attack does any damage to the Defending Pokemon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), remove 1 damage counter from Turtwig.

name: Vulpix
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to Vulpix.

name: Weedle
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from Weedle and put it onto Weedle. (This counts as evolving Weedle.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Zubat
Attack2Text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
